name: Knight Club
description:
KNIGHT CLUB Is a 2-4 player action platform-fighting game that brings traditional fighting game elements into an unlocked, free form movement playstyle. Equip your favorite armaments and do battle against your friends locally or online!

Designed For Competitive Play
Knight Club has been built with competition in mind, and features a slew of classic fighting game mechanics. Counter hit, just defend, wavedash, and crossup your way to victory!

Perfect For Parties
Not in the mood for brutal competition? No problem. Knight Club has a handful of casual game modes that are perfect for 2-4 players!

Online Multiplayer
No friends? No problem! Take the fight to random strangers online in any game mode, with up to 4 players! Check out the community link to join our discord and set up some matches.

Consider wishlisting Knight Club: Deluxe on Steam!
Here are a few features that will be in Knight Club Deluxe.

custom characters
new weapons
sub weapons
new attacks
new game mechanics
ranked online play
rollback netcode
new game modes
training mode
and more!

Though the game is currently free, consider donating to help further development. Thank you!
